Resources

Jump To: Sessions | References | Datasets | Dashboards

Sessions:

  1. All Participants Orientation

    (02/23/2023 - 1 hr)

    A general event overview for all persons participating in the Hack the Threat 23 hackathon.
    Topics will include:
      • Team Deliverables
      • Example project timelines
      • Available resources

    [ Add to Calendar] [ Session Slides] [ Zoom Link] [ Video Recording] [ Discord Server] [ Github]

  2. Mentor Training

    (02/28/2023 - 1 hr)

    Overview and training for project mentors, student mentors, and co-mentors.
    Topics will include:
      • Project requirements
      • Mentoring best practices
      • Available resources
      • Mini-Hack

    [ Add to Calendar] [ Session Slides] [ Zoom Link] [ Video Recording] [ Discord Server] [ Github]

  3. Hackathon Kick-Off!

    (03/02/2023 - 2 hrs)

      • Overview
      • Code of Conduct
      • Mentor Project Pitches
      • Team Formation

    [ Add to Calendar] [ Session Slides] [ Zoom Link] [ Video Recording] [ Discord Server] [ Github] [ Code of Conduct] [ Awards and Judging Criteria] [ Mentor Pitch Slides]

  4. Friday Morning Checkin

    (03/03/2023 - 1.5 hrs)

    Team Introductions (1-slide/1-minute)
      • Team name
      • Team members including Mentor and Co-Mentor
      • Team Theme Song (Instrumental only)
      • Team Virtual Background
      • Team Emoji

    [ Add to Calendar] [ Zoom Link] [ Team Introduction Slides]

  5. Friday Afternoon Checkin

    (03/03/2023 - 1.5 hrs)

    Project Goals (1-slide/1-minute)

    [ Add to Calendar] [ Zoom Link]

  6. Saturday Morning Checkin

    (03/04/2023 - 1.5 hrs)

    Project Status and Tasking (1-slide/1-minute)

    [ Add to Calendar] [ Zoom Link]

  7. Saturday Afternoon Checkin

    (03/04/2023 - 1.5 hrs)

    Project 1-Day Progress (1-slide/1-minute)

    [ Add to Calendar] [ Zoom Link]

  8. Sunday Morning Checkin

    (03/05/2023 - 1 hr)

    Project Status and Tasking (1-slide/1-minute)

    [ Add to Calendar] [ Zoom Link]

  9. Monday Morning Checkin

    (03/06/2023 - 1 hr)

      • Team Introduction Videos
      • Post Survey Opens
      • Viewer’s Choice Ballot Opens

    [ Add to Calendar] [ Zoom Link]

  10. Final Presentations

    (03/06/2023 - 2 hr)

      • [Deliverables Due] Github Repo Link
        • PDF of Presentation Slides
        • Source code
        • README.md with Project Goals and Team Members

    [ Add to Calendar] [ Zoom Link]

Dashboards:

  • R for Data Science - R for Data Science. Code in R / concepts useful any language - had.co.nz
  • Tidy data for efficiency, reproducibility, and collaboration - openscapes.org
  • Tidy data Paper - Original paper by Hadley Wickham (founder of R) who pioneered the concept of tidy data - https://vita.had.co.nz/papers/tidy-data.pdf
  • Tidy data - informal and example code heavy (in R) version - tidyverse.org
  • Chart Chooser — Juice Analytics - https://www.juiceanalytics.com/chartchooser
  • Plotly graphing library - https://plotly.com/python/
  • Dash App documentation - https://dash.plotly.com/
  • Deploy to Heroku integration from github - https://devcenter.heroku.com/articles/github-integration
  • Dash guidance / command line (scroll past Enterprise information to Heroku / free section - https://dash.plotly.com/deployment
